short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This shows a summary of the posts on the front page of a subreddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This popup extension allows you to quickly search the title of posts on the front page of a subreddit and how many upvotes those posts have.
